sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: There are no required changes in any of the config files. Configuration information can be found in the man page for fcron.conf.
fcron scripts are written using fcrontab. Refer to the man page for fcrontab for proper parameters for your situation.
Create the boot script with the following:
Create the symbolic links to this file in the relevant rc.d directory with the following commands:

userinput.command: cd /etc/rc.d/init.d && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc0.d/K08fcron && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc2.d/S40fcron && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc3.d/S40fcron && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc4.d/S40fcron && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc5.d/S40fcron && ln -sf ../init.d/fcron ../rc6.d/K08fcron
